DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study ass whether hyperbaric oxygen treatment improve neurological function patient exhibit white matter hyperintensities MRI examination . The secondary goal study determine possible use MRI discern difference perfusion central nervous system tissue region white matter hyperintensities hyperbaric oxygen administration compare hyperbaric air .
DOC.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment Patients With White Matter Hyperintensities
DOC.detailed_description: Consecutively enrolled patient assign hyperbaric oxygen hyperbaric air random number . Physicians supervise hyperbaric treatment treat technician , evaluate neurologist , interpreter MRIs blind regard patient treatment status . All patient receive placebo offer treatment hyperbaric oxygen .
DOC.criteria: Over 50 year age White Matter Hyperintensities MRI brain Two symptom and/or Neurological impairment e.g . gait disturbance , dysequilibrium , decline cognitive function , upper motor neuron deficit , dysmetria , hyperreflex unilateral increase muscle tone Contraindications hyperbaric oxygen therapy e.g . pulmonary emphysema bulla , claustrophobia , seizure disorder Inability patient tolerate pressurization e.g . eustachian tube dysfunction Extreme cognitive impairment Major Depression Other uncontrolled comorbidities e.g . diabetes , hypertension , thyroid disorder , carotid artery stenosis ( 70 % ) , renal hepatic dysfunction History brain tumor , head trauma , electroshock therapy , brain irradiation migraine headache
